definition: guests filled the hall (idiom); a house full of distinguished visitors

sentences.english: The band played the guests in.
Officials with the China Basketball Association were also among the 70 guests.
sentences.chinese: 中國籃球協會的官員也在這70位賓客中。

sentences.english: Let's decide on the guest list for the movie premiere.
sentences.chinese: 我們來決定這次電影首映會的賓客名單吧。

sentences.english: Hotels will be professional service and comfortable environment P Plus welcome guests.
sentences.chinese: 酒店將以專業的服務，舒適的環境恭迎八方賓客。

sentences.english: At the wedding reception, the bride or groom greet theirs guests.
sentences.chinese: 在姻緣喜宴上，新娘和新郎向賓客表達歡迎。

sentences.english: Never has an invitation been accepted with more enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 世界上從沒有哪份邀請會受到賓客無比熱情的歡迎。

sentences.english: Departing guests are asked to check out by noon.
sentences.chinese: 離開旅館的賓客須在中午前辦理結賬手續。
賓客們會永遠記得婚宴上的食物。

sentences.english: Since then, cover pie beef that is served as prefect of the implementation of separate ways into the dining guests.
sentences.chinese: 從此，牛肉罩餅即成了歷任知府執行各路賓客的美食。

sentences.english: The waitress beamed a cheerful welcome to the guests.
sentences.chinese: 女服務員對賓客笑臉相迎。

sentences.english: After all the guests had gone, the drunk master leaned against the tree and fell asleep.
sentences.chinese: 當賓客散去後，喝醉了的男主人斜靠在槐樹下睡着了。

sentences.english: This was the second marriage for the groom, who wanted to avoid inviting the same guests from the first wedding.
sentences.chinese: 這次是新郎再婚，他不想邀請頭婚時的賓客。

sentences.english: The guests were played in on the organ.
Between 0815 and 0945 - The general congregation will arrive at the Great North Door of Westminster Abbey.
sentences.chinese: 普通賓客抵達威斯敏斯特大教堂北大門。

sentences.english: Museum guests preview the "Summer of China" series.
sentences.chinese: 博物館的賓客在預覽“中國夏日”系列展。

sentences.english: Dear guests, Thank you for your stay at Sunny Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 親愛的賓客，非常感謝您入住香溢大酒店。

definition: to taste a small amount/to sample
